comment: Auto-linking for native modules (source-based) * Updated `npx react-native config` to create the needed json for auto-linking * New `npx react-native autolink-windows` command to perform auto-linking * Auto-linking occurs automatically during `npx react-native run-windows` * New Auto-linking targets and props so CLI apps throw a warning if auto-linking should be run * New targets and props for native modules to consume
